Ụlọ akụ Liberian maka mmepe na ntinye ego (LBDI) bụ ụlọ akụ mmepe mba Liberia nke na-arụkwa ọrụ kemgbe 1988 dịka ụlọ akụ azụÁmahịa
Ọ bụ isi na Monrovia ma gọọmentị Liberia na ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ mmepe mba ofesi hiwere ya iji nyere aka wulite akụrụngwa ego na Liberia.

Emebere ya site na iwu nke ndị omebe iwu nke mba na 1961 n'okpuru ntinye aka nke gọọmentị Liberia na nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ ego mba ụwa zụrụ nha nha nha na Bank, ya bụ: International Finance Corporation, Commonwealth Development Corporation, Capital Partners, European Investment Bank, na Agence française de développement, na Deutsche Investitions-und Entwicklungesllchaft, ihe karịrị 150 ndị Liberia onwe ha, ụlọ ọrụ mba ụwa na mpaghara ndị ọzọ.Akụkụ mba ọzọ bụ 44.47% na òkè obodo bụ 55.53%.
LBDI bụ ụlọ ọrụ nwere onwe nke onwe n'okpuru njikwa onwe yana Board of Directors nke ndị nwe ya na-ahọpụta kwa afọ
Ụlọ akụ ahụ malitere ọrụ na 1965 dị ka Ụlọ Akụ̀ Liberia maka Mmepe na Ntinye ego
N'okpuru mgbawe na 1974, a gbanwere aha ahụ na Liberian Bank for Development and Investment (LBDI)
Mgbanwe ọzọ e mere na 1988 nyere ụlọ akụ ahụ ohere itinye aka n'ọrụ ụlọ akụ azụmahịa, iji gbakwunye ebumnuche mmepe ya.
